name: SafeCode
author: Hassan Derakhshandeh

sections.description:
Easily add snippets and custom codes and functions for execution in WordPress environment. These codes will run safely and will not generate fatal errors, so your site won’t break if you make a typo in your code. ðŸ™‚

Perfect tool to use as your site’s functionality plugin.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the whole plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Goto Settings -> SafeCode
  4. Enjoy!
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Improve error handling
  • Add CodeMirror

0.1.1

  • Improved security by preventing CSRF attacks. Thanks Otto!

short_description: Add snippets and custom functions, without the worry to break your site.
